reviews.review: multi million dollar corporation, still cant do nothing against cheaters in nova 1 rank, RIP CSGO
Great game, but you have to buy prime if you want to enjoy your playing experience. Too many hackers otherwise.

Бросил Коктейль Молотова союзники решили рашить по нему, выкинуло с сервера за урон по союзникам, с блокировкой подбора игр на 24часа.

4/4 поджигателя жопы в моей команде!
Para mim o melhor jogo online... sempre competitivo

The thing about CSGO, is in many ways like an alcohol addiction. 

You will get this game, keep it in your library and only ever take it out on some occasions. 
But then one day, you will get in a match, this match will feel good and make you feel special - maybe you even have a few friends with you for the ride - and thats when it happens, you win and you get a crate. 

You think to yourself, "Oh a crate, nice, I've seen people get these", so you look up the crate and see you can win skins. 

This is where you should stop, and delete CSGO. For once you open that sweet, oh sweet crate. You. Are. Doomed. 

It'll start subtly, stop playing League or any other multiplayer games, then you'll get tired of other multiplayer games you've previously loved. And in the end, not even singleplayer games can make you feel the sweet embrace of accomplishment. Only seeing those sweet "16"s on the scoreboard will do it for you. 

And the crates will get plentifull, your inventory fuller and fuller. and once it's reached that point - the streams start. Either your own, or watching the ESL or other major CSGO streamers. 

By this point, it is way - way to late for any hopes of going back to the normal world of gaming. 

So, no I do not recomend this game unless you know what it will cost you. 

TL;DR Don't get the game, walk away while you still can.
